title.rendered: INTECH recognized as the ONLY Process + Safety SIS System Integrator in North America by Rockwell Automation

content.rendered:
INTECH Process Automation Inc. has now become a member of the Rockwell Automation PartnerNetwork™ as a Process Safety SIS Recognized System Integrator, which ensures further strengthening of technical and commercial collaboration between the two organizations.

This partnership is a result of INTECH’s continued excellence in delivering quality SIS projects in the automation industry over the years using Rockwell Automation’s AADvance and ControlLogix SIL 2 systems. It recognizes INTECH’s long standing healthy relationship with customers and Rockwell Automation as well as INTECH’s provision of domain expertise to the automation industry over several years.

INTECH received the recognition certificate from Rockwell at INTECH’s Houston offices and is now the ONLY Rockwell Automation recognized Control, Process + Safety System Integrator in North America. “INTECH has been identified as a Process Systems Integrator due to the strong experience and reputation of delivering successful process safety SIS projects in various industries”, said Robert Billy – Global Program Manager, Process Partners for Rockwell Automation

As a Rockwell Recognized Control and Process + Safety Integrator, INTECH and Rockwell will be working together to establish business objectives, competency development and access to Process Applications, Libraries and Tools. With an authenticated source of hardware/software and OEM warranty for Rockwell’s renowned technologies like AADvance and ControlLogix SIL 2 systems, INTECH will be able to serve the global oil and gas market with a complete process control and safety solution, and provide long term O&M support.

About INTECH

INTECH operates out of Houston, Texas and provides a complete set of Products and Solutions which encompass the entire lifecycle of a standard oil & gas automation project either greenfield or brownfield. Through its superior execution methodologies and best practices for controlling project management & associated site services (including maintenance), INTECH has successfully implemented hundreds of successful projects over the last 20 years worldwide. Our complete portfolio of solutions coupled with our comprehensive knowledge of both offshore and onshore oil & gas facility’s makes us the preferred automation solution provider for world’s largest oil & gas companies.

INTECH’s processes are proven through industry standard certifications including: ISO9001, CSIA Certified Membership, UL508, 30+ TUV FSEng Engineers, PMP® certified project managers. With a well-trained team of engineers, certified work processes and strong local supply chain relations, INTECH is fully geared to cater to the global oil and gas industry’s automation needs.

For more information, please go to www.intechww.com

About Rockwell Automation

Rockwell Automation, Inc. (NYSE: ROK), the world’s largest company dedicated to industrial automation and information, makes its customers more productive and the world more sustainable. Headquartered in Milwaukee, Wis., Rockwell Automation employs about 22,000 people serving customers in more than 80 countries.

For more information, www.rockwellautomation.com

About the Rockwell Automation PartnerNetwork™ Program

The Rockwell Automation PartnerNetwork program offers global manufacturers access to a collaborative network of companies mutually focused on developing, implementing and supporting best-in-breed solutions to achieve plantwide optimization, improve machine performance and meet sustainability objectives.
